entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: You recovered the hijacked ship and cache of weapons for Cora
entries.journal_entry_description: Cora wants you to recover the hijacked ship and the remainder of its cargo.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Cora wants you to investigate the location where Donovan last saw his ship.
entries.task01_comm_message_text: We are in luck! I want you to secure that ship.  I will be sending a detachment of troopers to fly it back to Tyrena.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Several Deflarian security guards are patrolling around the ship.  To secure the ship for return, they must be eliminated.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: It appears there are several Deflarian mechanics doing work on the ship. Whatever they are doing to it must be stopped.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Cora wants you to secure the ship by eliminating the mechanics and security guards around it so that it can be returned to Tyrena.
entries.task05_comm_message_text: Excellent work. I will send a squad of troopers and a pilot to collect the ship. The next order of business is to recover the weapons and kill the Deflarian leader, Deflaros.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Cora wants you to eliminate 4 Deflarian bodyguards.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Cora wants the Deflarian leader Deflaros eliminated.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Cora wants the weapon containers secured.  Inventory each one for recovery by her team.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: Cora wants the 5 weapon containers located and secured.  This will also involve eliminating the Deflarian leader, Deflaros, and his bodyguard.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Cora wants you to return to her.
